name: server
description: A College ERP system is a technology-based software to store, analyze, manage, and supervise the data. It also helps in smoother operations and better internal communication alongside maintaining transparency. For instance, a College ERP System will manage the data related to their students.A College ERP system is a technology-based software to store, analyze, manage, and supervise the data.
